Description

Take to the skies in an adrenaline-fueled battle against a relentless horde of enemy forces. strap yourself into the cockpit of a powerful warplane.  As a Frontier Fighter, you'll take to the skies in an adrenaline-fueled battle against a relentless horde of enemyand dodge incoming fire as you soar through the air, taking out your enemies one by one. Enter the fray with all enemies in sight! The red hue of your foes makes them easy to spot and track, thanks to the intuitive red indicator that shows their location on the battlefield. But beware, each enemy type has its own unique behavior and tactics, making them a formidable challenge. There are three different enemy types to contend with: the Fighter Plane, a slow-firing but far-sighted enemy; the Attack Helicopter, a rapid-firing threat that closes in for the kill; and the Elusive Blimp, a stealthy enemy that repairs other foes, making it a top priority target. So, stay sharp, adjust your strategy, and get ready for an epic aerial showdown!

Don't worry, you have the Armory! Step into the heart of the battle with the Armory - a collection of the most powerful weapons ever created! Emerging from the shadows only once in a while, this arsenal of destruction gives you the upper hand in any fight. Choose from three devastating types of weapons - the Burst weapon, a hail of bullets that takes out your enemies in a single explosive burst; the Spread Canon, raining death with a hail of spread shots; or the Machine Gun, an unrelenting barrage of lead that tears through enemy lines in mere seconds. With these weapons at your disposal, the skies will tremble and the ground will shake as you unleash an unstoppable wave of fury upon your enemies. So, sharpen your aim, tighten your grip, and prepare to dominate the battlefield!

But you don't do this for nothing! Get ready to reap the rewards of victory with every pulse-pounding wave! Your performance will determine your payout, and with every turn, you'll earn cold hard cash that can be used to upgrade your aircraft and gear. The more you dominate the skies, the greater your reward will be! With a minimum payout of 10 dollars per turn, you'll be able to fund your own aerial armada and become a one-man air force to be reckoned with. So, strap in, aim high, and get ready to bank big on the battlefield!

You can use your payout to become a one-man air force in The Aircraft Maintenance Shop! Here is where you'll take your trusty war machine to the next level and unleash its full potential. Whether you're fixing the plane after a rough mission or boosting its abilities, this is the place to be. Upgrade your ship's max dash time, health, and dash speed to an astonishing 10 times their original power! Make your plane a force to be reckoned with, capable of outmaneuvering and outgunning any enemy. So, suit up, soldier, and get ready to embark on the ultimate flying experience!

The goal of this is to utilize your quick reflexes and tactical skills to survive for as long as possible in this intense, non-stop shooter. Do you have what it takes to become the ultimate airborne warrior the Frontier Fighter?

Goal

The Goal of the game is to surve as many

Waves as you can

Enemys will try to shoot you down from the sky. The only thing you can do to surve is to shoot them down

Good luck Frontier Fighter!

Shops

There are 2 types of shops in the game

Money:

Every wave you get money accordning to your performens in the wave. You will minum get 10$ per turn

Shop - Aircraft maintenance

Aircraft maintenance is where you can upgrade and fix your aircraft.

In the shoop your can:

- fix the plane

- bost the ships, max dahs time, health 

  and dash speed (maximum 10 times)

Shop - Armory

Here you choose a new weapon for your plane. In the Armory comes out once in a while and there are 3 types of weapons: Burst weapon (shoots in Burst), Spread canon (shoots spread shots) and Machine gun (shoots many shots in a short period of time).

Enemys:

All enemys are colored red and you can se where they are with the red indicator

The different enemys behave different on the battle feild. There are 3 different enemy types:

  • Fighter Plane : This plane fires when it sees you or flies around looking for you . The plane shoots slowly but can see you far away
  • Attack Helicopter : This Helicopter shoots when it sees you and or flies around looking for you. This Helicopter fires very quickly but only fires when you are close
  • Elusive Blimb : Blimp looks for enemy planes or helicopters and repairs them when it's close, so it's important to go after it and shoot it down when you see it

Good advice: Keep your distances
